评论详情: I absolutely love my CRZ Yoga Pants! They fit perfectly, offering just the right amount of stretch and support. These pants are incredibly lightweight and comfortable, making them ideal for all-day wear. Despite their casual feel, they have a polished look that is nice enough for work. As a teacher in a warm climate, I find them perfect for keeping cool and comfortable throughout the day. Highly recommend!

评论概述: The best pair of pants EVER!!!!!!!
评论详情: I Believe these are the best pair of pants I've ever had in 56 years!  I was shocked. Great value for how much I love them, and I am DEFINITELY going to order more---  great number in color selection. I never wrIte reviews because I don't have time, but this calls for a standing ovation!  Suuuuuper soft, super professional looking for work (so versatile, because they aren't like regular yoga pants), fantastically fitting, very forgiving in terms of stretchiness, cut in perfect proportions, and high quality workmanship (I'm a seamstress). The fabric is some kinda WOW!  Lucky the girl who finds this product.

评论概述: Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style!
评论详情: The CRZ YOGA Women’s 4-Way Stretch Ankle Golf Pants are an absolute win! These pants are incredibly comfortable, thanks to the soft, stretchy material that moves with you. Whether I’m on the golf course, running errands, or dressing them up for a casual outing, they fit perfectly and feel amazing all day long.  The tailored fit and ankle-length cut are super flattering, and the fabric is lightweight yet durable. I also appreciate the functional pockets, which are both practical and stylish. They’re easy to care for and look just as good after multiple washes.  If you’re looking for versatile pants that combine performance with style, these are a must-have. Highly recommend them for active and everyday wear! 🏌️‍♀️✨

Love these pants! I got a navy pair just for golfing in cooler weather after learning they were a dupe for a notorious -lemon brand. Loved them. When I learned that for my new job black golf style pants are recommended I immediately ordered two pairs in black. I got XXS and XS to see which I liked better but actually kept both. Both fit just fine. The XS has a *slightly* higher rise and are a tiny bit longer. There may be a smidge more room in the hips. I thought I would prefer one size over the other but now would like to order a third pair to help keep the weekly laundry down and can’t decide if I want another XXS or another XS. I am 5’3” about 115. I normally wear 0/00 in pants. I have not tried the real version of these copycat pants but find them comfortable, lightweight, stretchy, the waist band isn’t too thick, doesn’t cut in, also isn’t too tight relative to the fit of the rest of the pant. They seem to be a “normal rise” they don’t ride up. The pockets are nice and big but not lumpy. The pants dry fast if splashed and don’t seem to hold on to dirt or dust or pet hair. The drawstring lays flat and has little metal bits on the ends that haven’t fallen off yet in the dryer despite washing every other day. They’ve survived the dryer. They aren’t too wrinkly if you hang dry. They don’t seem to snag easily. They don’t seem to show any wear at all yet even though I’ve not been gentle when wearing or washing. Highly recommend. If I got the real pants for twice the price I’d be worried about ruining them at work. I don’t think these pants are necessarily cheap in price but neither is the quality.

评论概述: Nice fabric but fit wasn't for me
评论详情: I have a thick waistline and can't stand to wear anything even slightly tight. These tights are soft and a great color, but I had to return them, as they were just too uncomfortable around my waist. I'm afraid the next size up would be too big, as they were comfortable other than the waist.  (My daughter-in-law has them and loves them by the way, but she's more of an hourglass shape than I am)

Great pants! They have four way stretch so they are so comfortable. Perfect for running errands or working out. You will not regret this purchase! Get yours today! They run true to size and the color is beautiful!

All I can say is PERFECT. I love these pants for everyday comfort. They always look neat and trim and a perfect pant for running around and doing errands. The pockets are wonderful and there’s a hidden pocket for credit card or drivers license. Nice idea to be able to cut down on taking a purse everywhere. I own several pairs of these. They fit true to size and wash well.

I am 5'6" about 200 lbs (+/-) and I ordered XXL in a teal blue, light blue and a color called Melanite. (those are still coming) The length of the pants go just over my ankles and the pockets do gap a little, but thats because I carry a lot of my weight in my middle. I have bought many many styles of these type of pants and I believe I have found the perfect ones. They fit very nice (sorry I do not do photos), I would say true to size. The legs are slim and in the seat area fit nicely, not too snug. The stretch band at the waist is a nice width and comfortable, not tight. There is a draw string, not sure why, because the elastic waist is more than enough to keep the pants up. The material is a lovely soft polyamide, that feels like modal fabric. The pants look dressy enough to be paired nicely with an upscale top, for work, or dress down for casual outings. I have, as of yet, not laundered, so I will have to see how they hold up afterwards. For now I'm very excited to have found these pants!

I’m 5’3” 103 lbs. I ordered an xxs. These pants are so cute and overall fit great. I grew up in the legging /skinny jeans trend so I have a hard time venturing out. These pants aren’t super baggy on me but I wish they were slightly a little tighter around my legs. The length is okay. The pants go down to my ankles. I think I’m going to have to hem them a few inches so I can get the 7/8 pant look.  Overall the pants are great. I just feel like they fit more like an xs than a xxs.

As a work from home girly these are the pants I reach for everyday and will be buying more. I am 5'3 if I stand up stright and the length is just right for me. The pockets fit my phone and dog bags (and treats) for a quick walk during breaks. Even if I have to run into the office just throw on a blazer or sweater and I am good to go. They even wash well too.
Pants run small.  Will need  a larger size. Works for a a shorter person!
Worn many times in casual and business situations. Feels comfortable in all. Laundries well with no wrinkles.

My favorite pants.  Please make a few in colored patterns like lululemon.  Great golf, gym, scrub pants that wash and dry well.  These will hold up exactly as is until you wear them spelunking in a tight underground bat cave.  Great 4 way stretch.  Draw strong is long enough on big sizes and finished nicely.  I promise to keep buying if you make a few colorful appropriate gym patterns.

These pants are amazing. 5”4 155lbs. I went with a large and they are great, probably could have comfortably gone with a medium too. The material is ridiculously soft. Very stretchy. Kind of pant you could lounge around in or pair with a sweater and dress them up. Will be purchasing many other colors. I purchased the charcoal gray ones to start. Really love the bottoms of the pants too. They aren’t totally tight to the ankle yet don’t flare out too much. Perfect. As a shorter person they are right at my ankle and what I would consider to be a full length. Taller people might consider more of 7/8.

评论概述: Great pants but need to be tall for pants to be ankle length
评论详情: I bought these for golf. Love the fabric and pockets.  Very stretchy.  I wanted ankle length, like the pictures, however these hit the top of my shoe.  A different look than what I wanted.  They needed to be 2-3 inches shorter.  Returning these.  I’m 5”5 and weigh 123.
They’re not too heavy or too light. Not too casual like sweats but just as comfy. These are my go to pants. I got a small and they fit true to size.
I love these pants, they are so comfy and stretchy. I have them in many colors and I wear them to work every day and they are great!
Great fit!

评论概述: Super comfy and very nice looking
评论详情: Love the comfort, the stretchiness, and how they look casual and dressy at the same time.

I should have looked at the reviews with photos. I’m 5’4 and these do not fit like in the pictures of the models. They are long. They are also more form fitting. I wear a small and these were tighter than a loose fit. Size up if you do want a more casual loose fit. If you’re taller I’d say these would be good for you but not if you’re shorter.
I love these pants. I have them 5 colors. They hold up great in the wash. I don't dry them.

Despite all the great reviews, unfortunately these pants are not flattering on curves. They were way too tight on my hips, butt, and thighs. But I could tell if I ordered a size up, they’d be too long and the crotch would sag too much. I’m 5’2” 145-150 and usually between a M-L. I ordered M.

The quality is average, similar to other yoga or gym wear—stretchy, smooth, and with a distinct color. The sizing is accurate and fits well around the waist, but the length is long and may not suit petite individuals. It sits higher than the waist when worn. It’s good for general use, especially due to its flexibility, like leggings. However, some colors and sizes may have limited availability and longer delivery times. Be cautious, as it might shrink in the wash; use laundry nets and hang dry if possible.  The brand should consider offering PETITE sizes, as there are many customers who would benefit from them. This could boost sales.

I've been looking for comfortable pants to dress up or down and these are it! The fabric is a good weight and very forgiving, the waistband is amazing as well--no gaps! I pair these with a nice top and a cardigan and they look professional. I can change into sneakers and a t shirt and hit the gym easily in them as well. The dark olive color is amazing paired with a navy and white top and sandals for a casual look. I have the purple brown and I am getting them in black as well. I usually am between a M and a L and went with L for a little more ease to them, but I would say sizing is spot on. I am 5'5" and about 160 lbs and the Large drapes nicely without being too clingy. Overall excellent work pants for an active teacher and they travel really well also. Easy to look put together and cute without a fuss.
Wear every day  can dress up with a pretty top or dress down with a sweatshirt
Nice fit; they look good!  Comfortable and good to wear to work.
I ordered several pairs of these pants in the past. These were about a half an inch longer. Not ankle pants on my 5 foot four frame.
I love these pants.  You can dress them up and keep them casual.  My only regret is that they do not have back pockets.

For reference, I am 5'2" and 168 pounds with a mom pooch (thanks to my 5 awesome kids). I've been searching high and low for high rise, everyday pants that don't give me a terrible camel toe and don't extenuate my mom pooch. These are it! These pants are incredibly comfortable and breathable. The outside has a silkier texture and the black color is not see through. I am in Michigan and these are great for the 40-50 degree mornings and 70-80 degrees afternoons. I was shocked at the quality of the pants because I expected what you would normally get when it comes to active wear (which for me has usually been a swing and a miss), but these exceeded my expectations! Because I am so short, these are not ankle pants on me and I have about 2 inches of extra material at the bottom. This isn't a deal breaker for me because they look cute rolled up. They go right at my belly button and don't press into my pooch to make it uncomfortable. These have held up their shape and I love the versatility of being able to go from lounge wear, to casual, to semi casual, to work meetings. I will definitely be ordering more!

I was never a capri person, they always seemed like they made my legs look shorter by cutting them off mid-calf.  Not a good look.  I really like slouchy pants that hit above the ankle, really feel like that is a casual, classic look.  These pants tick off all the boxes for me.  They are slightly fitted so you won't look frumpy, they are lightweight, they come in great colors, and the material stays cool and wrinkle free.  Did I mention these have side pockets?  I am pretty much wearing them whenever I run around town on errands, and these look better than gym leggings IMO ( which are so popular as casual wear these days).  Buy these pants, they are fantastic.  I have 6 pairs.
I bought these pants for a travel outfit and they have been my go-to pants every time they come out of the laundry. They look put together but feel so soft! I just bought in more colors.
Material is breathable. Washes well! They have a very neat appearance while playing golf or going for a walk. Great pockets! I have three pair! I want a pair for everyday. So I will buy some more.

These are amazing! Super soft material, they feel comfy and casual but they look refined. They don’t stretch out throughout the day, they stay looking polished & clean. I bought a large for skinny-feeling days and xl for not-so-skinny feeling days but I don’t want to look sloppy. Both in color black. I love them both and never feel out of place in either size.

评论概述: Fit not right for this narrow hipped gal.
评论详情: The fabric was nice and the stitching looked good. It looked like a quality product. However, I have narrow hips and there was WAY too much room in what is normally the “saddle bag” area. For reference, I’m 5’8”, 138, athletic build, and there was plenty of room in the Med. Wanted to love them, but didn’t fit my body type. Darn.

The pants are a good fit and the fabric is a good weight. I like them other than the side seams around the pockets don’t allow the pockets to lie flat. I haven’t returned them because I can wear them with a tunic top and the pockets can’t be seen. I planned to buy more but I think I’ll stop at one.
I really wanted to love these pants, because the color is absolutely beautiful. But they were super shiny, and would make tons of noise when I walk. Hard pass. I ended up returning them.

Based on the picture, I thought these were going to fit more like pants with looser legs. I ordered my normal size and the legs were very tight even though the waist did fit. Not the style I was looking for.

评论概述: What I was looking for - Athleisure feel
评论详情: Definitely fit as I wanted it to, however, the only fault is my height. I am 5'2, and like almost every pair of pants it is typically 1" or 2" too long, however, this inseam fit don't bother me much. The inseam still looks pleasant for being petite. The material is light enough to wear for spring/summer but durable enough to exercise in. There is some stretch to it and the material feels nice - think, athleisure. I am typically a size 6, 28", and ordered size small. The fit is perfect, it doesn't squeeze the butt and thighs -i do have some curves- and it just caresses the bumm thighs nicely. It's just tight enough to feel like a layer over the skin with slight looseness. The only thing I don't like about the pants are the protruding pockets, other then that it's a nice pair of pants. I am going to purchase other pairs/diff colors.

Love, love, LOVE these pants. They are truly very comfortable for wearing around the house or running errands. The fit is perfect, not too loose/baggy but not too tight anywhere (including the inner thighs). They look great and feel wonderful. The length is a perfect fit as well, even for someone who is on the shorter side like me. I bought a size small and for reference I am 5'2" and about 120 lbs. The bottom of the pants fall right at my ankle bone.
These pants are cozy and comfy but can pass as nicer pants to wear around town. A fancy looking sweatpant almost. Great fit and pockets too!

评论概述: XS is just the right size for me!
评论详情: I bought these earlier in a Small because I was worried about them being too tight, but they were a bit too large.  I’m 5’1 and under 110lbs. I have a long-ish torso for a petite woman and too-tight waistbands have always been the bane of shopping!

If you're looking for this kind of casual pant (synthetic fabric, elastic drawstring waist), these are the ones to get--and I've tried them all.  True to size , and long enough on my 5'6" frame to reach to my ankle bones, just where they should be.  Absolutely great for traveling.  These are my go-to on long plane trips..  An excellent dupe for my $100+ Lulu pants--in fact, these are better, because the waist isn't as bulky.

I received my pants and can say the material is awesome. I love the stretch and feel of the pants. I am 5'4" and 180lbs. I ordered an xl. I believe I could have worn a l as there is lots of give in the material. I am too old to wear tight clothes so keep that in mind if you are buying to showcase your boots! I am giving this a 4star rating only because I have not washed them yet and don't know if that will effect the stretch.

评论概述: Great pants although a little pricey
评论详情: I really hate wearing jeans and have been really trying to find pants to wear instead of jeans so I decided to give these a try. I thought these were really flattering and can easily be dressed up or down depending on how you want to style them.  Size wise the XL fit for me. I'm 5'8", athletic build and typically wear a L in Aerie leggings and Old Navy pants and Under Armour XL if that helps.  Overall really like these but just wish the price was a little lower. They're basically just a glorified pair of joggers. I think the $25-$30 range would be a much better price point.

Purchased 2 pairs of these pants over 4 months ago. Have worn them repeatedly. Love them. They are very comfortable. I am 5’4 150 lbs. Tried the large and x large. The x large fit best. They hit me right at the ankle.  I say better than jeans because they are more comfortable and have more stretch. And when I’m traveling I can wear them for at least 3 days before I need to wash them. They dry very quickly after washing. I definitely recommend these pants.
These pants are stretchy and comfortable.  Feel like they are quality material, making them breathable .  Do not like the inseam on these pants though.  Seems a little long.

I expected these to be shorter, I was hoping for a cropped pant. But they are long enough to just make them look like business casual pants, so if you’re looking for comfortable biz casual pants, these are it. They just look really awkward on my body. I’m 5’5 and they look like pants that are too short for me instead of intentionally cropped pants.

These are without a doubt extremely comfortable.  A bit thin but so soft and stretchy it’s like a second skin.  They don’t stand up to frequent washings compared to its higher price competer so is it worth to spend the extra money upfront?  In my opinion yes.
Surprisingly pleased with these! High quality, comfortable and flattering. They're sporty, but can be dressed up or down. Good pockets, too. Will be buying another pair! Thank you!
Great quality, look great, fit perfectly, I am 5'9 and they hit perfectly at my ankle.
These are a great addition. Sizing is good, fabric is very good. Very happy with purchase!!!

I like the idea of leggings, but not the figure for them, and I’m okay with that. These pants are the best solution to this conundrum. Excellent stretchy fabric. Comfort in any sitting position. POCKETS for phone or lip balm or tissues. Light weight and so flattering to this old bod. Nice price point so I was able to purchase them in a number of colors.

My job requires a lot of moving and up and down. These pants are perfect for that. Look professional but also give me so much flexibility to move around without fear of ripping out. Had these for 7 months so far and they hold up amazing! I get compliments all the time on them. They’re also perfect for going golfing or dressing up a casual fit a little more than sweats.
Love the pants… just need a different size.

“Golf” means spring. This fabric is too cold for a transition pant. Additionally, after washing and drying, experienced a lot of static cling. Maybe won’t dry them next time. The fit is really comfortable all that aside. At 5’1”, these are full length not ankle as expected.
I should have bought it sooner, I love everything about this pants! Wrinkle resistant is a huge plus, it’s perfect for traveling! Silky smooth texture, it’s very comfortable yet elegant!

I'm 5'5 and they're too long. I ordered a small. They don't seem to be 7/8 length. I have to roll them up otherwise they're bunched up at the bottom and look bad. Besides this I love the material and the fit. I can't handle a tight waist due to stomach issues and this waist is good, almost too tight but just fine. They're slightly tight on the butt but that's okay. I'm going to return them and try a petite medium from another brand.

These pants are super soft, comfortable, and good quality, however I got them in hopes to wear them to work, and they definitely don’t work for that. They’re basically like thick leggings with a drawstring waist. I am a size 27 in jeans and I ordered a medium. They are pretty tight, so I wouldn’t feel comfortable to wear them to work. I decided to keep them to wear at home, however I am having some regrets because they aren’t incredibly flattering.

I got these for my mom with dementia and Parkinson’s. These are nice and easy to pull up and look nice. She dresses them up and down and they look great, especially in black - they easily look like slacks. Highly recommend

评论概述: At last a GREAT pair of pants! Returned these pants
评论详情: I am 5'2" 95lbs and finding pants that fit my frame can be a nightmare. These pants are the perfect length, perfect drape, and soft! I am so happy with them that I ordered more in other colors.  ***I am changing my rating of 5 stars to 4 stars only because I ended up returning all of these pants because the stitching inside was causing me grief. I suffer with horrible neuropathy and anything even stitching can aggravate it. They are other than that, very good pants.

I bought these trying to find a dupe for my favorite Athleta Brooklyn Ankle Pants. These are really close and about a third the price. If you’re under 5’4” they definitely aren’t above the ankle. They hit the top of my sneakers. Cute though. I’m going to wear them to the gym as an alternative to leggings.

Love these. They are so soft and definitely versatile. Could be athleisure or can be dressed up.  One thing I’ll say is that since I’m larger in the hips, the pockets stick out just a touch. But it fits perfect everywhere else.
Flattering and comfortable. Good quality
Great product, wife loves them. Ordered more
Material is really nice and is a great fit! I'll definitely be buying more.

These pants are perfect for traveling!  I recently took these on a trip and loved the comfort. They are easy to pack without worry of wrinkling. Well made, nice fabric and fit.  Can be dressed up or down.  They are true to size. I usually wear a size 10 or medium and the medium fit perfect.  I am tall and the length was above the ankle, but that was what I wanted!!  Highly recommend!

评论概述: Comfortable and can pass for work pants
评论详情: I got these pants since I wanted thin pants to wear in the summer that was comfortable but able to work in! They are extremely comfortable, lightweight, and stretchy!
I like the fit and texture of the pants

If you love LuLu pants- these are identical in look and feel. I have washed mine 10+ times and the texture and color has not changed- super flattering fit, wear with sandals or tennis shoes- these are also the perfect travel pant!
I am excited to wear these to work as they look dressy. They are extremely soft and comfortable. I will be ordering more pairs. However, I would size up from your normal size for a looser fit.
These pants are soft and cozy. They feel like you are wearing lounge pants but look classy. I thought the fit was a little big so I’d size down one. The pockets are great for little things.
I'm in love with these pants. The quality and comfort are just what people have said. I love how you can dress them up or casual.

评论概述: Beat Casual Pant Purchase in Years
评论详情: I just purchased my second pair of these pants. Here's what to love:  Light weight knit, very comfortable waist band, deep pockets, no wrinkles and so smooth again the skin (nice change from denim and leggings). Great for travel as they roll up, easily hand wash and drip ry O/N. They do well in a standard wash/dry cycle as well. Note: the weight of the fabric is a bit more substantial than the very light weight running pants (what some used to call wind pants). The fabric hangs beautifully from the slightly gathered wait and stretches but the cut is so good, there are no stretch points in the fit.

i'm short at 5'1 and 130 lbs. These fit me perfect. I get a medium and they fit like normal pants, lengthwise. I've bought most of the colors. Also, they are super soft and keep you dry where you need it.

These pants were great, except for 2 things. 1) the pockets were bulging, which didn't look very nice overall. It basically needed to be like an inch less. 2) it easily shows your panty lines in the back.  If you won't get bothered by these, I'd absolutely recommend getting this product. The color and the fabric felt very nice.

These are excellent pant. Can be pulled off as a dress pant with a cute loafer, or bootie. Or can be worn for casual with a sneaker. They are so so comfortable. The material is very stretchy and the waistband is comfortable The couple times I have worn them so far I wasn’t eager to take them off when I got home. They are comfy enough to lounge it. I’ve worn them for work and for a full day of outings chasing my two toddlers around. They don’t get baggy throughout the day. they are lightweight so perfect for spring and summer. I’m size 12-14 5’9” and the XL fit great!

I love these pants so much that I now have three pairs!  They are soft, comfortable, perfect for travel and, most importantly for me, they are cool to wear in the heat and humidity of South Florida.  Definitely a best buy.

评论概述: They fit well and are well made!
评论详情: Promoted as golf pants but they could easily be worn for play, work or relaxing!  Planning to buy more!

评论概述: True to size and very comfotable
评论详情: Pants are true to fit and soooo comfortable. Nice enough to wear out and about, will probably order every color😊
Super comfortable. Quality is fantastic. I wear them to work as a more dressy yet comfortable pant option. Great elasticity. Wrinkle free!!! This brand in general makes great quality clothing!
Fabric is soft. Fits as expected, with the exception it's baggy in the front crotch area. Just looks weird on. Not flattering.
These pants fit as per the size chart.  The material feels nice against my skin.  I use these pants to go shopping.  Love the two side pockets. A
PERFECT FOR ANY OCCATION
They're not very flattering, but good for a day on the golf course with clients.

I’m 5’1”, and most 7/8 length pants hit me at the ankle.  These are several inches too long and hang off of me.  I’m 140 lbs and bought the medium. The fabric is good quality, and they wash well. So these could be good pants for the right height and body type.

These pants are a perfect fit for me.  Comfy waist and slim fit in the thigh and leg. Very flattering.  No back pocket, but side pockets are good enough.  They are moderately stretchy.  Fabric is soft and weightier than expected. May be too warm for summer wear.  I am 5'6 155 lbs and have recently purchased active,  elastic waist pants from 3 different retailers; all of which fit me best in a size large.  The Amazon size chart recommended  size XL, and the XL fits great.  IMO, they run small.

These pants are good for Phoenix summers.  They absorb the sweat & don’t make you feel overheated.  I bought the oyster (off white) color & the fabric is heavy enough you don’t see through it but yet not too heavy for summer.  I only gave it 4 stars because the front pockets do seem to poke out a bit.
This parts are soft and light but the material is thick enough that you cannot see your underwear line. they are great for traveling and working from home.
I really like these and have decided to keep them. Although I am 5’4” and these are like regular pants on me. Great stretchy material. Would buy again.

评论概述: Very comfortable pants for so many occassions
评论详情: I'm 5'8"  135lb and I originally ordred the M, which "fit", but I didn't want them to fit snugly.  I could have kept the M, but returned for the L just to see if it was a better fit, which is was.  The L fit really well and didn't cling to by bottom. The M size showed a bit too much of my backsides lumps & bumps :) :)  The length of the L is just at my ankle which is perfect for this type of pant.  You can easily wear sneakers, or flats with these pants.  They are super comfortable.

评论概述: Good one but bought wrong size as website recommended
评论详情: I like the material. Size recommendations is bit looser so I returned but I’m going to order again in small size.

These pants are the perfect work pants. They have great stretch, non piling material, nice thickness but not too thick and nice thick waist band. Also had a perfect length and deep enough pockets.  For reference I'm 5'2 168 lbs and got the large.
I bought these for our vacation. I love the sleek look and easy care. Comfortable. True to size

I am 5'4'' tall and really wanted to like these pants however, they were too long for me. They were full length instead of the 7/8 I was expecting. These pants could easily be dressed up or down and I was really hoping they would work but ended up returning.

So comfortable! My job requires some outdoor work while maintaining office affaire. Survived 95° heat, high humidity while still keeping cool and maintaining shape. Much better than traditional office slacks. 5’8” 130lbs and S fit great.

I ordered 2 pair, same size, same color. One fits tighter than the other. Both fit a bit tighter than expected. I would’ve upsized had I known these fit snugly. The fabric is nice, thicker than expected - not see-through at all, tapers down to the ankle, 32” long. Fabric does have stretch. I gave it 3 stars because of the fit difference in the 2 pair of the same size. Still wearable, so I kept them.

I never write product reviews! But these pants are absolutely amazing and worth every dime. The only thing I don’t love is the length. I am a size small and 5ft 4in and I have to cuff them at the ankles twice. I’m going to buy these in more colors!! They can be dressed up or down..
Great pants!  It's smooth and soft.  It is not bulky.  They are perfect for everyday wear.  I will definitely buy again!!
Nice pants, but way to long! I should have read the reviews better.
Casual and comfortable.
